description: Whip up this spectacular cake in a flash for an easy dessert. Peaches and cream are the perfect summer combo and the Caramilk crumble is a must-try.
keywords: Peaches & Cream Cake With Malted Caramilk Crumble
name: Peaches & Cream Cake With Malted Caramilk Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 460 g Woolworths double unfilled sponge cakes

recipeInstructions.text: Place one cake on a serving plate. Spread with half of the jam, then half of the cream mixture. Scatter with half of the crumble and half of the peach. Top with remaining cake, jam, cream mixture, crumble and peach. Serve.
